word: H4116 - מָהַר - mâhar - maw-har' - Be carried headlong

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - பெருகு, நெடிதாங்கிடை, கவிழ்க்கப்படு, பதறு, பதற்றமுள்ளவர்கள், வேகம், தீவிரம், தீவிரி, சீக்கிரம், தீ விரித்துவா, துரிதம், மகேர், உடனே, விரைந்து, ஓடு
a) (Niphal) to be hurried, to be anxious; to be hasty, to precipitate, to be impetuous
2) to hasten (used as an adverb with another verb)
3) to hasten, to prepare quickly, to do quickly, to bring quickly

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; properly to be liquid or flow easily, that is, (by implication); to hurry (in a good or bad sense); often used (with another verb) adverbially promptly: - be carried headlong, fearful, (cause to make, in, make) haste (-n, -ily, (be) hasty, (fetch, make ready) X quickly, rash, X shortly, (be so) X soon, make speed, X speedily, X straightway, X suddenly, swift.
Cognate: H4106, H4116, H4117, H4118, H4119, H4120, H4121, H4122
